nodes.text: A Queen's Diary is a Star Wars Legends Level 2 DK Readers title that recounts the events of the film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, as retold by Padmé Amidala, Queen of Naboo. It was written by Simon Beecroft and was published by DK Publishing on September 17, 2007.
The book was reissued with new cover art as part of the Learn to Read with Star Wars: Leia Level 2 box set on December 12, 2017.
Read all about the thoughts, secrets and feelings of Padmé, queen of the planet Naboo.
